headline: Kroger issues recall of popular deli item over contamination fear
summary: Whenever a company has to issue a recall on a product, whether it's a food or a household item, it risks its reputation. However, companies are required by law to issue recall announcements if there is a risk of illness or injury to the public. In that case, the recall is considered ...
